events.text: Come out and enjoy live music on the patio, featuring a split set of performances with the full band and Neetchy solo project.
Band Together Buffalo presents 12 Local Bands over 3 days at Resurgence Brewing Co! $20 for a 3-Day Weekend Pass - General Admission includes a FREE drink ticket.
Neetchy's Birthday Bash is happening at none other than the eponymous venue. A full night of music with 4 different artists all taking part. You won't want to miss this!
